org.openintents.tools.simulator

类 SensorServerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.SensorServerThread
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SensorServerThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Handles the communication with the SensorClient from the Android phone or emulator. This class is invoked from the SensorServer.
    作者:
    Peli, Josip Balic, ilarele

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      SensorServerThread(SensorSimulator newSensorSimulator, java.net.Socket newClientSocket)
      Constructor to start as thread.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SensorServerThread

        public SensorServerThread(SensorSimulator newSensorSimulator,
                          java.net.Socket newClientSocket)
        Constructor to start as thread.
        参数:
        newSensorSimulator - , SensorSimulator instance of simulator that starts thread
        newClientSocket - , Socket that is used in connecting

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Method to call only once thread.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

      • listenThread

        public void listenThread()
        Handles communication with the client. In a simple protocol, all Android Sensors class methods are received and answered. If necessary, exceptions are thrown as specified in the Sensors class.

      • getSupportedSensors

        public java.lang.String[] getSupportedSensors()
        Method used to get currently String[] of currently supported sensors.
        返回:
        String[] filled with names of currently supported sensors.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Closes the socket.

      • setNextThread

        public void setNextThread(SensorServerThread newThread)

      • setPreviousThread

        public void setPreviousThread(SensorServerThread mLastThread)

      • getNextThread

        public SensorServerThread getNextThread()
